title: Bug 41200GTK contents of check and radio buttons can't be aligned to center and to the trailing edge of widget.
OB: Bug 41200GTK contents of check and radio buttons can't be aligned to center and to the trailing edge of widget. GTK container, which contains label of check and radio button, always remainswith it's default width. Therefore text of label visually is always aligned toleading edge of corresponding SWT Button.
